result.adr_address: Nadii Svitlychnoi Ln, 1, Kyiv, Ukraine, 02099
result.name: Lider Dar

reviews.text: Nice and casual. I can say that our meals were tasty.

I came to have lunch today. The order was made by the very first. I ordered a dish that does not require cooking, namely dumplings. Sat down at the table. The table was dirty, everyone saw it, but no one even thought to wipe it. About fifteen people ordered dinner after me. The cafe worker brought utensils, while she was putting them, a knife fell on one of the visitors, containers with salt and pepper simply fell out of her hands. But they did not open successfully. I waited an hour for the order. Everyone who ordered after me had already eaten and left. A cafe worker came up and asked who didn't get the order, to which I said, "What's mine?" Another 20 minutes passed, no change. Cafe workers looked into the hall but did not enter, dirty dishes were not cleaned. Everyone who has already eaten left dirty dishes on the tables, no one even thought to clean them, it turns out to be the norm in this cafe. I came to find out why I can't wait for the order for two hours, to which I was told that everything is fine, but the dumplings need to be cooked. The kitchen asked whether the dumplings should be cooked or not, to which the cafe worker replied that it was not necessary, threw me money for the order and said that I could go home from the cafe and eat there. Because I spoiled their mood. Upon my request to provide me with a book of complaints, they replied with a smile that they have an electronic one. Unfortunately, he did not wait for the apology. Left the institution. I would like to note that in this cafe there is a constant confusion with the dishes, at the slightest remark only rudeness and rudeness can be heard. I cannot recommend it to anyone. Wasted time, a hungry stomach, a spoiled mood, that's all that awaits you in this establishment.

A nice place where you can eat deliciously, order a family holiday, the cuisine is truly home-style, the service is good, the prices are quite democratic, business lunches are not expensive. Payment can be made in cash or by card. I recommend!!!

The word "service" does not apply to this beach cafe. A bunch of local cattle, drunkards and the rude behavior of the waitresses, especially Nadia, who is rude, rude and insults customers - this is the first thing that awaits you in this swamp.
The local beach cafe is characterized by a lack of service and culture, low-quality products and dirty, untidy tables with leftover food.
The director of this establishment has repeatedly received complaints about service and staff, but purposefully does nothing and does not respond in any way to regular customer complaints.
Waitress Nadiya, if you can call her that, communicates exclusively in Russian, which is prohibited by law.
The store sells alcohol after 9 p.m., which is also prohibited by law.
I do not recommend coming to this so-called cafe. There you will spoil your mood, your appetite, and maybe get poisoned by expired food.

One star is too many. Think three hundred times about coming to this so-called “cafe”. In order :
The waiter Nadezhda is always rude, rude and behaves inappropriately. Quote: “Don’t look at the schedule that hangs on the doors, the cafe closes at 22.30, get out of here because I want to, call whoever you want, no one tells me...” This is the answer to the question why then is the schedule on the doors until 23:00? Further more interesting
Don’t look at the two pages of the cocktail card at all, there’s an official for you there. will say: “I don’t know how to do this and won’t, order something else,” which is strange because the prices for expensive alcohol are more expensive than other things, but oh well. The director has repeatedly received complaints about this waitress of Balzac's age, but does not react in any way, only apologizes, but things are still there... Strange, with such a reputation and rudeness towards visitors you will not gain good fame.

Half the menu is not available at all...
The quality of the products has dropped significantly, including rotten herring, caviar, lard and much more. I am already silent about the singed tablecloths on the tables that have not been changed for more than 10 years. They bring one menu for three people, when there is a whole stack of them on the bar and the room is empty, a couple of times they didn’t bring it at all, with the words “take it yourself, is it difficult for you?” For such rudeness there will be complaints to the fire department (the cooks and waitress smoke at the entrance)
